text: Plan A
is a company that provides

carbon accounting services,
decarbonization, and CSRD

reporting for businesses
across the globe.

CSRD is the newest
and most comprehensive

regulation coming from
the European Union

to encourage and standardize
reporting for environmental,

social and governance
dimensions for businesses.

As a startup company,
AWS for us was an obvious choice

because we didnâ€™t need
to invest into a heavy IT team

to set up our infrastructure
and application.

And also due to the pay-as-you-go
pricing model that AWS provides,

we were able to just pay
for the resources that we need.

We also look at the carbon
emissions and we try to minimize

our green IT emissions using
also that flexibility from AWS.

Generative AI provides
a lot of opportunities for us.

For example when it comes
to the improvement of the

data mapping flow of our clients,
when we collect their data

or we use it already
in-house for process

optimization, for example,
knowledge sharing and curation.

We are also aware, of course,
as a carbon accounting firm
of the sizable carbon emissions

related to the utilization
of large language models.

So we use it responsibly
and we try to strike a balance

to optimize the decarbonization,
accelerate the decarbonization
of our clients using AI.
I really hope that

more and more businesses
get interested by regulation

or by their interest
into sustainability

and of the business
case to sustainability.
